name: Leave the service: send a written notice

tosdr.tldr: In order to terminate your account, you need to send a written notice to SoundCloud, Berlin. All your content and your activity will be “irretrievably deleted by SoundCloud, except to the extent that we are obliged or permitted to retain such content, data or information for a certain period of time in accordance with applicable laws and regulations and/or to protect our legitimate business interests”. You should back up your tracks.
